EmailTemplate.textOnly:
- - - - Clean Clean false false false EN-US X-NONE X-NONE Hi David, Not that I am aware of I did not see anything scheduled on my calendar. Did you schedule an appointment on the online calendar below? If you did it must not have took because we would have both received a confirmation email.If you would like to schedule again below please do so, otherwise just let me know a good time to reach out to you directly. Thanks,Sara From: dwmmcgee@comcast.net [mailto:dwmmcgee@comcast.net] Sent: Thursday, August 23, 2012 11:46 AM To: Sara Conde Subject: Re: MBO PARTNERS INTRODUCTION Sara,
Did we have a meeting at 9:30?
David McGee720-252-7135 From: "Sara Conde" <sconde@mbopartners.com <mailto:sconde@mbopartners.com>> To: "Mark Spoor" <mspoor@envision-bc.com <mailto:mspoor@envision-bc.com>>, dwmmcgee@comcast.net <mailto:dwmmcgee@comcast.net> Sent: Wednesday, August 22, 2012 1:31:32 PM Subject: RE: MBO PARTNERS INTRODUCTIONHi David, Nice to meet you via email. I wanted to introduce myself as the person at MBO Partners responsible for all new associate and partnership requests. Ill be your main point of contact to provide you an overview of our services and answer any specific questions you may have. You may easily book a time that is convenient for you on my online schedule by going here <http://mkto-l0128.com/track?t=c&&&&https://my.timedriver.com/8SLYS?mkt_tok=2xUAKZjCdkJJukhky%2FmXNKD%2BljrON5qr9b9yBJ2MuKVUsyIUGIalUg%3D%3D>. You can also watch a short video about who we are on You Tube <http://mkto-l0128.com/track?t=c&&&&http://youtu.be/zKDzwSTmGv4?mkt_tok=2xUAKZjCdkJJukhky%2FmXNKD%2BljrON5qr9b9yBJ2MuKVUsyIUGIalUg%3D%3D>. I look forward to speaking with you and sharing more information about MBO Partners! Sara ___________________________________SARA CONDEConsultant Services Advisor MBO Partners t: 703.793.6028f: 703.793.6068e: sconde@mbopartners.com <http://mkto-l0128.com/track?t=c&&&&mailto:sconde@mbopartners.com?mkt_tok=2xUAKZjCdkJJukhky%2FmXNKD%2BljrON5qr9b9yBJ2MuKVUsyIUGIalUg%3D%3D>w: www.mbopartners.com <http://mkto-l0128.com/track?t=c&&&&http://www.mbopartners.com/?mkt_tok=2xUAKZjCdkJJukhky%2FmXNKD%2BljrON5qr9b9yBJ2MuKVUsyIUGIalUg%3D%3D> Notice: This email and any files transmitted with it are confidential. They are intended solely for the use of the individual addressed. If you have received this email in error please notify postmaster@mbopartners.com <http://mkto-l0128.com/track?t=c&&&&mailto:postmaster@mbopartners.com?mkt_tok=2xUAKZjCdkJJukhky%2FmXNKD%2BljrON5qr9b9yBJ2MuKVUsyIUGIalUg%3D%3D> and permanently delete the e-mail and files. From: Mark Spoor [mailto:mspoor@envision-bc.com] <mailto:[mailto:mspoor@envision-bc.com]> Sent: Wednesday, August 22, 2012 3:28 PM To: Sara Conde; dwmmcgee@comcast.net <mailto:dwmmcgee@comcast.net> Subject: MBO PARTNERS INTRODUCTION Sara meet David. David meet Sara. Sara we are considering David for a contract with one of our clients. He has some questions about MBO. David - Sara is our rep for MBO.
